channel.title: [pi]tragedy pk help [pi]
channel.description:
I got tragedy pking and i need help with a few things
i need help with a shop that takes differenct currency and then i can trade it. When i try to trade it doesnt let me trade but then i need to fix currency.
Protect prayers dont work e.g melle range and mage npcs hit threw it. Then same with players
Pest control players um it says they have lack for zeal every game and dont get points.
Then pk points it gives random amount of points. When you kill somone.
